Just an hour’s drive from the city centre, this castle-themed resort is a paradise for nature lovers and thrill seekers alike. Spread across 30 acres of untouched terrain, it offers the perfect setting for a fun-filled day out with friends or family.An exciting day begins as the drawbridge lowers to welcome you into the castle. The thrill continues with adventures like ziplining and treetop walking, exploring a secret tunnel, and going on scenic nature treks. Bounceville is packed with inflatables for endless jumping fun, while Soapy Football lets you slip, slide, and score on a field full of suds.If you're looking to unwind, the resort also offers a museum tour, magic show, rain dance, and a refreshing swimming pool to relax in.Book your Hidden Castle Resort Hyderabad day outing today and create unforgettable memories with your loved ones. Read more 05 The Golkonda Resorts & Spa, Hyderabad Located near Osman Sagar Lake, The Golkonda Resorts & Spa is a luxurious retreat offering an exquisite blend of nature and elegance. It is considered one of the best resorts in Hyderabad for family. Spread across 13 acres, the resort features spacious villas and suites designed with sophisticated interiors. Each villa comes with private gardens, ensuring a peaceful and lavish stay. The Ixora Spa provides rejuvenating Thai therapies, making it a perfect wellness getaway. For recreation, guests can enjoy the large swimming pool, a well-equipped fitness centre, and various indoor and outdoor sports facilities. The resort’s multiple fine-dining options serve delectable Indian and international cuisines. Ideal for weddings, conferences, and romantic getaways, Golkonda Resorts combines modern luxury with Hyderabad’s royal heritage, offering a truly exclusive experience. The resort also offers curated experiences such as lakeside dining, cricket matches, and guided nature walks. With its state-of-the-art banquet spaces, it can accommodate up to 2,000 guests, making it one of the most preferred resorts in Hyderabad for grand events. Mrugavani Resort and Spa features well-designed cottages, tree huts, and luxury tents, allowing guests to experience nature without compromising on comfort. Ranked among the top Hyderabad resorts, it boasts an outdoor swimming pool, a wellness spa, and a fine-dining restaurant serving delicious food. The rooms are equipped with modern amenities, while the property itself is surrounded by lush greenery and scenic landscapes. Adventure seekers can explore cycling trails, nature walks, and bird-watching tours within the park. The resort also features a dedicated wildlife interpretation centre and guided safari experiences, allowing guests to explore the diverse flora and fauna of Mrugavani National Park. With its tranquil setting and world-class services, Mrugavani Resort is definitely among the best resorts around Hyderabad for those seeking relaxation amidst nature. The resort’s architecture reflects South Indian traditions, featuring intricately designed cottages and villas. Each accommodation is spacious and well-furnished, providing a cosy and comfortable stay. The property, considered to be one of the best resorts around Hyderabad, also includes a swimming pool, a rejuvenating spa, and an open-air dining area. The resort is a perfect getaway for those seeking relaxation with a blend of nature and heritage. Guests can engage in various recreational activities like cycling, archery, and table tennis. Additionally, the property offers an outdoor fireplace, a picnic area, and a well-maintained garden. The multi-cuisine restaurant serves delicious Continental, South Indian, and Chinese dishes, making dining a delightful experience. With its serene atmosphere, personalized service, and top-notch facilities, Brown Town Resort is an excellent choice for a weekend getaway. The resort features pyramid-style accommodations, a massive swimming pool, and well-manicured gardens, making it an eye-catching retreat. It offers well-equipped rooms with elegant interiors, ensuring a comfortable stay. Guests can enjoy a variety of outdoor activities such as beach volleyball, cricket, and indoor games. Additionally, a well-equipped gym, boardroom, and event spaces make it an ideal venue for business meetings and weddings. Ideal for families and corporate events, Papyrus Port is definitely one of the best Hyderabad resorts for family, providing a one-of-a-kind experience. The in-house restaurant serves delicious meals, while the spa and wellness centre ensure complete relaxation. A well-maintained swimming pool and dedicated play areas for children make this one of the best resorts in Hyderabad for family vacations. The resort offers three accommodation options: Deluxe Room, Luxury Room, and Vintage Room, all designed with modern amenities. The property also features a beautifully landscaped garden, a bonfire area for cosy evenings, and an adventure zone with activities like ziplining. The resort also arranges bonfires on special requests, creating a perfect evening ambience. With warm hospitality, eco-friendly surroundings, and a serene environment, Ananya Eco Resorts guarantees a memorable family vacation. Here you can get personalized services and 24 hours room service. The resort is also known for its spa.2. Vivanta Resort by Taj: This place follows international standards and features all modern amenities required by a luxury resort. With stunning interior decorations and delicious food, this resort offers a unique staying experience. You can also enjoy amenities such as a lounge, bar, fitness center, and swimming pool.3. Radisson Blu Resort: This place manages to achieve the perfect blend of comfort and luxury. It is known for its prompt services and its air-conditioned rooms with minibars. They also have a spa and a bar where you can enjoy some drinks.4. Lahari Resort: Nestled between splendid fountains and greenery, this resort features a large swathe of land with beautiful flower beds and lawns. The professionally trained staff provide you with quality services. Which of the resorts in Hyderabad are good for couples? 1. Darling Cave Resort: This is a popular couples resort which is surrounded by beautiful landscapes, making your stay even more romantic. You can relish a candlelight dinner here with your partner and create lasting memories. There is also a cafe, a spa, and a swimming pool at this resort.2. Summer Green Resort: If you wish to enjoy some peace and quiet with your partner, the Summer Green Resort is the perfect choice for you. It is complete with an amphitheater, along with video games, tables tennis, and air hockey facilities.3. Brindavan Resort: This resort attempts to recreate the holy city of Brindavan in Hyderabad. It is a popular couple’s retreat with elegant and well-decorated rooms.4. Ragala Resort: Surrounded by natural splendor, this resort provides couples with some much-needed privacy. You can arrange cocktail parties at this place and take a dip in the swimming pool. The spa is known for its treatment options. Which are the resorts in Hyderabad with swimming pools? Mount Opera Resort - At this resort you get to enjoy both an amusement park along with resort stay. It has a multi-theme park with mechanical rides along with a refreshing pool and many other amenities. Radisson Blu Resort- This is a perfect place to enjoy world-class facilities and services. The property has much to offer such as a spa, three restaurants, a cafe, kids’ play area, and lots more. Vivanta Resort by Taj - This is a five star resort with international standard facilities and amenities. Enjoy its wonderful pool, multi-cuisine restaurant, lounge, amazing interiors, and loads more. Palm Exotica Resort - Palm Exotica is an eco-friendly resort with luxurious facilities set amidst the natural beauty of the Highlands of Shankarpalli. It is child friendly, it has wheelchair access and many other elements of comfort. Which are the resorts in Hyderabad for couples? Ragala Resort - Set in the lap of nature, Ragala Resorts offers a unique blend of privacy and adventure. There is a pool as well as a spa where you can indulge in some truly relaxing therapies. Darling Cave Resort - This is one of the top resorts in Hyderabad for couples with its groves that are ideal for candle light dinners. Summer Green Resort - Ideal for those looking for some quiet time in the lap of nature without compromising on luxuries of modern living. You can also indulge in various indoor sports such as billiards, air hockey, table tennis, etc. Brindavan Resort - This Resort features elegantly designed rooms, relaxing atmosphere with the theme revolving around the romance between Krishna and Radha. Golconda Resort and Spa - Combining luxurious facilities and natural surroundings, Golconda Resort and Spa one of the best stay as well as day outing resorts in Hyderabad. It has spacious rooms and also offers bonfires, barbecues and other activities.Pragati Resort - Pragati Resorts is one of the best resorts in Hyderabad when it comes to a value for money option. There is a water park, a pool, a playground, a game room, a Spa and many other amenities. Darling Cave Resort - This is one of the ideal resorts in Hyderabad for couples. What are the best resorts in Hyderabad for weekend getaway? Dhola-Ri-Dhani Resort - Experience Rajasthani-style holiday at one of the most unique resorts near Hyderabad- the Dhola Ri Dhani. Treat your tastebuds to some awesome Rajasthani cuisine.Haritha Lake Resort - Located close to the Shamirpet Lake, this resort is a great weekend getaway for families as well as youngsters. It has AC and non-AC cottages and a great multi-cuisine restaurant. Mrugavani Resort and Spa - At this Resort, you can choose to stay in standard rooms, tree huts, fabric tents or cottages. Rest your weary soul with a dip in the pool, a walk in the lawns and the gardens. How can I spend 2 days in Hyderabad? Here are the best places to visit in Hyderabad in 2 Days:Day 1:Visit the iconic Charminar to see the monument and its intricately carved tombs and minarets and surrounding street market. See the Chowmahalla Palace, which was the 17th-century official residence of the Nizams. It is a replica of the Palace of the Shah of Iran. Visit Salar Jung Museum to see the country’s largest collection of 1st-century antiques.Day 2:See the iconic Mecca Masjid that is built from soil brought from Mecca. Visit the legendary Golconda Fort dating to the 15th-century. Don’t miss the light & sound show held here in the evening. Visit Laad Bazaar for authentic pearls and lacquer bangles. Show More Newly Added Hyderabad Experience 40 Ratings Hyderabad Airport Transfers ₹ 2,500 ₹ 2,000 per car Book Now 9H 80 Ratings Songs of Earth Resort Hyderabad Day Out ₹ 1,299 ₹ 1,000 per adult Book Now 10H 49 Ratings Ragala Resort Hyderabad Day Out ₹ 1,153 ₹ 899 per adult Book Now 7H 73 Ratings Mrugavani Resort Hyderabad Day Out ₹ 1,320 ₹ 1,100 per adult Book Now Trending in Hyderabad Sightseeing in Hyderabad 8H 156 Ratings Hyderabad City Tour ₹ 3,500 ₹ 2,800 per car Book Now 4H 189 Ratings Half-Day Guided Tour of Hyderabad by Car ₹ 5,250 ₹ 4,200 per car Book Now Hyderabad Top Attractions Places To Visit In Hyderabad Explore Hyderabad Ramoji Film City Ramoji Film City is a perfect place for all the Bollywood and cinema lovers. The place was set-up by Ramoji Rao in the year 1991. Since then, Ramoji Film City has been serving as a spectacular getaway for the locals of Hyderabad and tourists worldwide. Sprawling over an area stretch of around 2500 acres, this wonderland has been crowned as the World’s Largest Film Studio Complex under the Guinness Book of World Records. At a time, this massive piece of entertainment can accommodate up to 20 different film units. It features several different film locations such as Japanese Gardens, London Street, and Hollywood Signage. Hospitals, buildings, laboratories, and other landscapes are some more add-ons. The expansive section of Ramoji Film City has got a wide array of varied activities. As soon as you step into the city, you are welcomed by a replica of the London bus. The job of this bus is to pick you up and drop you alongside a town that more or less resembles the Texas countryside. Once you had enough of the United States feel, you can then further move on towards the Japanese-roofed buildings and the Eiffel Tower. Close to it lies another palace inspired edifice – the Amer Palace.If you are lucky enough, you might get a chance to dance to the tunes of melodious Rajasthani-style music. After relaxing for a while, you can then board a train that will drive you through the Filmy Dunia – a sequence of tunnels. Your kids will surely enjoy their train ride as it makes its way through the snow-capped mountain ranges and sandy desserts. Apart from all the entertainment options, Ramoji Film City has got the best eateries to serve you with some delectable food preparations. Dil Se Restaurant, Hollywood Restaurant, Jimmy’s Drive Inn, Galaxy Restaurant, and Superstar Restaurant are some places to try. If you're planning your visit, make sure to check out the available Ramoji Film City Tickets in advance to avoid last-minute hassles. Excited? With unlimited adventures, studio tours, live shows, Ramoji Film City is undoubtedly a perfect weekend respite for you and your well-wishers. Read More Charminar Beating in the heart of the city, Charminar is a precious gem of Hyderabad city, and pride of the country India. It is a heritage left by the Qutb Shahi Dynasty to mark the brilliance of its sultanate. The oldest mosque constructed in the ‘City of Nizams’ is also established in this massive example of Indo Islamic architecture Charminar, which itself means four minarets and justifies the construction of the monument.Nestled near the bank of the river Musi, this ultimate monument was the idea of Muhammad Quli Qutb Shahi which became tangible in the year 1591 AD. It was constructed when the Sultan changed the former city to the present Hyderabad due to an extreme shortage of water. However, there are more stories related to it but marking the beginning of a new era sounds the most realistic.Also considered as the ‘Arc de Triomphe of the East’, Charminar is the heartbeat of the old city of Hyderabad. The monument is taken into consideration to further expand the city so you will be able to notice the development around it. One of the examples is the expansive Laad Bazaar, which is surrounding the elegant masterpiece and brimming with mouth-watering delicacies, authentic street food, colorful lacquer bangles, shining pearls, excellent jewelry and many more things to take home. Read More Golconda Fort Located in the city’s western part, Golconda Fort is one of the most famous attractions in Hyderabad. Built at an approximate distance of around 9 kilometers from the popular Hussain Sagar Lake, this fortress is a beautifully preserved monument of the country. Constructed in the sixteenth century, the fort is known to have sheltered the majestic Kohinoor diamond at some time in the past. It is believed that if one claps his hands at the fort’s bottom part, its echoes can be felt even at the top of the structure. The classic architecture, the rich history, and the potential mysteries of the fortress adds to the charm of the monument and invite a huge number of tourists from across the globe.The breathtaking glamour of Golconda Fort can impress anyone within no time. The sturdy body of the structure coupled with the highly advanced architectural style can leave any visitor awestruck and spellbound. Tourists visiting the fort can also catch a glimpse of the jaw-dropping sunset view from the topmost part of this fortress. Visitors can also capture the unparalleled grandeur of the fort in photographs and carry them home as beautiful souvenirs to remember their visit to the monument.Another highlight of Golconda Fort is the amazing sound and light show held here. Presented beautifully in front of the audience in three different languages, this show is sure to provide you a truly unforgettable and magical experience. Food served during entire trip was good and pickups and drop-offs all were on time. Adhiraj Banerjee Hyderabad Tour Package For Family Excellent The timing was perfect throughout the trip.
